name: Dinari KO
description: Dinari KO dShares (KO.d) represent 1:1 ownership of shares in The Coca-Cola Company (KO), one of the world’s most recognizable brands and a global leader in the beverage industry. Each KO.d token is fully backed by a corresponding Coca-Cola share securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, Dinari’s dShares provide investors with enhanced accessibility, fractional ownership, 24/7 trading, instant settlement, and improved liquidity, making traditional equities like Coca-Cola more accessible and efficient.
